availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Nathan R. Harris (Simpson County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Simpson County, Kentucky, farmer. Virginia native. Married to Elizabeth Harris. Father of G. Susan C. Harris, George T. Harris, Mary R. Harris, Sarah E. Harris, Nathan D. Harris, S. G. Harris, Emily F. Harris, James Harris, Louisa Harris, John Harris, Robert Harris, and Eudorah Harris. Married to Mary Harris. Farmer in Simpson County, Kentucky, in 1850. Owned eighteen enslaved persons in Simpson County in 1850. Farmer in Simpson County in 1860. Owned twenty-one enslaved persons in Simpson County in 1860.
